select
,st.stack_name,st.stack_version,ser.service_name,ser.service_user,clu.root,c.component_name,c.command_script,hst.hostname from host_component hc left join host hst on hc.host_id = hst.id left join component c on hc.component_id = c.id left join cluster clu on c.cluster_id = clu.id left join service ser on c.service_id=ser.id and c.cluster_id = ser.cluster_id left join stack st on clu.stack_id = st.id
